title: Format all files in directory with cli.

comments.body:
## [Current coverage][1] is `92.64%`

```diff
@@            master     #92   diff @@
======================================
  Files           18      19     +1
  Stmts          931     952    +21
  Branches       116     122     +6
  Methods                          
======================================
+ Hit            862     882    +20
  Partial          0       0       
- Missed          69      70     +1
```

> Review entire [Coverage Diff][4] as of [`e4ae4f8`][3]
